'''2.1.15841''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and [[MCD:Launcher|Dungeons]]), '''2.1.15842''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.15843''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on June 30, 2020.

== Additions ==
* Added Suomi [[language]] to the launcher.{{verify|type=change}}</onlyinclude>
